TopicTitle: A mod that removes the Kerbals at the bottom of the VAB and SPH

Articles.Content:
Hey, so I have a garbage computer. I'll start off with that. I run... okay sometimes(20-30 frames on a *good day)* and that's only while actually controling a vessel. While I'm in the VAB or SPH, I run fine as long as I pull the spacecraft all the way to the top, if I look down at the ground, my framerate drops to around 1-2 FPS. I'm not sure if it's the kerbals, or something else to do with the buildings, but I was wondering if there was any way to fix this.

Cheers, and thanks in advance.
